attributes.action: britain must remove its govenor generals from the carribean an leave the falklands
attributes.additional_details: this is the 21st centuary britain is no longer am empier an neither does it has the power the be so.the carribean belongs to carribean people the falklands belongs to falkands .the carribean wants closer allied with columbia venezula cuba an russia britain an the us still enforce their polices there at the very top when will the uk an the us learn the world they simply cannot have an to deprive carribean nationals for the betterment of british people via a vast currency exchange an old british laws is plain wrong the irradicate terroist britain must depart from the carribean without further delay .
